name: shape-points
description: Generate points for simple shapes and curves: arcs, rectangles, rounded rectangles, circles, ellipses, bezierCurveTo, bezierCurveThrough (i.e., bezier curves through specific points)

scripts.docs: markdown-api README.md line.js rect.js roundedRect.js circle.js ellipse.js arc.js bezierCurveTo.js bezierCurveThrough.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run docs

author: David Figatner
